subtext: Aptitude Test is time bound and contains 6 sections
points: There is no negative marking for any question in the entire section.
Do not leave any question unanswered.
If you are not sure about your answer, answer with your best guess.
In each of the sections, there will be multiple types of questions.
There will be a specific time allotted to each type, which will be indicated to you at the start of each section.
Keep in mind the time limits and plan your test accordingly.
